extendedInfo.description: This is the Pro version of Karl's Mortgage Calculator. The only change from the free version is that the adverts have been removed.Calculate mortgage payments given principal, interest and term. Reverse calculate any one variable given the other three.Enter a down payment amount or percentage and let the calculator show how large a mortgage you require.See how the monthly payment changes when you factor in additional monthly or annual loan costs such as PMI, HOA, taxes and insurance.The calculator supports Fixed and Adjustable Rate Mortgages (ARM) loans with up to five changes in interest rates. Interest-only mortgages loans are also supported.You can pay off your mortgage early with extra payments. Add one-off, monthly and annual extra payments. Choose up to six additional extra payment amounts and payment periods and the calculator will show how much money you can save on the loan.Choose from weekly to annual loan payments and adjust the compounding period from daily through annual periods. The calculator supports Canadian mortgages along with UK annual rest mortgages.Multiple rounding options on loan calculations are also available. Choose between no rounding, round half up, half down, to even, to ceiling and to floor.The calculator also supports the input and display of multiple currencies.

reviews.title: Awesome..
reviews.comment: I use this app whenever I\'m trying to figure out a monthly payment for any loan. Thank you very much
reviews.author: Mark Schork

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Best mortgage app on the market. Very accurate and makes great use of email export and amortization table. Big props to the developer for providing great support.
reviews.author: Brandon Bates

reviews.title: Value same as principal
reviews.comment: Very nice app! Lucky my home value is greater than my principal. I\'m sure the opposite is true of some other customers. When I enter either amount the other field becomes what I entered. Please fix this occurrence and any impact to your summary and graphs. Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: All that is needed
reviews.comment: This app has everything that is needed Perfect
reviews.author: Vijay Amritraj

reviews.title: Almost there
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t figure out how to factor in PMI. Otherwise excellent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Absolutely everything I was looking for.  Excellent job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beat the mortgage scammers
reviews.comment: I used this when investigating a refinance. It\'s been worth buying just to expose the mortgage companies that tried to manipulate the numbers. Saved me from making a big mistake.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Besr Mortgage Calc
reviews.comment: Been using the pc version for years. Love the android app.
reviews.author: Melanie Walker

reviews.title: It does so much!
reviews.comment: Works very well, clear concise and plenty of features including export the report. So handy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Flat out the best mortgage calculator l found so far. It does everything one can ask for.
reviews.author: A Google User
